results.title: Metformin effects on zonulin level in polycystic ovarian women

results.title: Bariatric surgery and HIV: Joint venture between family, primary care, and HIV physicians.
results.text_hl: She has a history of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type II diabetes@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Bipolar_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D001714 @@@bipolar manic depression@@@, @DISEASE_Endometriosis @DISEASE_MESH:D004715 @@@endometriosis@@@, recurrent @DISEASE_Herpes_Simplex @DISEASE_MESH:D006561 @@@herpes simplex@@@ attacks, @DISEASE_Shoulder_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D000070599 @@@arthritis in both shoulders@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Irritable_Bowel_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D043183 @@@irritable bowel syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Irritable_Bowel_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D043183 @@@IBS@@@), and @DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@nonalcoholic fatty liver disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@NAFLD@@@).

citations.NLM: Aydemir C, Al Saidi R, Choi JS, Ahmed MH, Mital D. Bariatric surgery and HIV: Joint venture between family, primary care, and HIV physicians. J Family Med Prim Care. 2024 Dec;13(12):5920-5923. PMID: 39790791

results.title: Gastrointestinal tract organoids as novel tools in drug discovery.
results.text_hl: These models have facilitated the study of the mechanisms and effects of various drugs, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_schizandrin_C @CHEMICAL_MESH:C031409 @@@Schisandrin C@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Prednisolone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011239 @@@prednisolone@@@, in these diseases.

citations.NLM: Zhou L, Luo D, Lu W, Han J, Zhao M, Li X, Shen T, Jin Z, Zeng J, Wen Y. Gastrointestinal tract organoids as novel tools in drug discovery. Front Pharmacol. 2024;15():1463114. PMID: 39281285

results.title: Metformin inhibits visceral allodynia and increased gut permeability induced by stress in rats.
results.text_hl: These results indicate the possibility that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can be useful for treating @<m>DISEASE_Irritable_Bowel_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D043183 @@@IBS@@@.

results.title: Retrospective analysis of the effects of a highly standardized mixture of Berberis aristata, Silybum marianum, and monacolins K and KA in diabetic patients with dyslipidemia
results.text_hl: Enrolled subjects had a diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Irritable_Bowel_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D043183 @@@IBS@@@ (and @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@), had @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@ caused by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, or were statin intolerant.
